q: I already have a PDF-based digital menu system. Can dgMenu still help me?
a: PDFs are difficult to update. Also, users do not prefer downloading files onto their devices because of the risk of getting infected by malware.

q: I already have a digital menu for my restaurant. Can dgMenu still help me?
a: Unlike your existing menu, dgMenu is hosted on the serverless JAMstack, resulting in faster page load times and cheaper cost of hosting.
